thread.section_title: Carbon Tax protest west of Calgary enters fourth month; RCMP monitoring situation
thread.title: Lengthy heat spell impacting some Calgarians
thread.title_full: Lengthy heat spell impacting some Calgarians

title: Lengthy heat spell impacting some Calgarians
text: An office, kitchen, and stage have been set up at the Carbon Tax protest west of Calgary as it enters its fourth month. As Jillian Code reports, the Alberta government says there are “no specific rules” to prevent people from staying overnight. 18m ago Officials in Calgary say they continue to detect wire snaps on the city’s recently repaired feeder main. 12 snaps have been discovered, including two on Wednesday, since the city brought the feeder main back into service in early July. Jayden Wasney reports. 38m ago An office, kitchen, and stage have been set up at the Carbon Tax protest west of Calgary as it enters its fourth month. As Jillian Code reports, the Alberta government says there are “no specific rules” to prevent people from staying overnight. 18m ago Officials in Calgary say they continue to detect wire snaps on the city’s recently repaired feeder main. 12 snaps have been discovered, including two on Wednesday, since the city brought the feeder main back into service in early July.
